What brings you here?

Oh, so you are Demitrius' daughter? Yes, we indeed had him visit us, but...
(Ugh... What do I say to her now...)

Yes, he made us leave. We had no idea no one had seen him since then.
The roads around are rather dangerous, but I hope he's fine.
I see, this is not like my father to go missing without telling me first.
I have a favor to ask, sir Arron, can you please show me where you left him?

I'm glad to hear that, sir Arron, I'm sure the Ancestors will bless your helpfulness.
